page.title: 17Recreation
page.content: In a survey of boys and girls in our class and their families (total 129) we found that 75% live in our survey area. The commonest form of recreation is swimming (45%) which is well catered for. Thornton Heath Baths are the most popular, but many go to more than one pool locally. Other sports are also popular (37%) but we found on closer examination that very few people belonged to clubs or organised groups, and played at home or on the local recreation ground. The other leisure activities were much lower in numbers e.g. 7% collecting (mainly stamps/coins) and fishing 6%. We noted that most recreation activities take place in or around our survey area and that very few people travel outside to well known beauty spots, to London or to the South Coast.
